actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Margaret Walker Alexander National African-American Research Center, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to make a grant to Jackson State University in Jackson, Mississippi, to establish the Margaret Walker Alexander National African-American Research Center on its campus in recognition of, and to commemorate, the literary contributions of Margaret Walker Alexander.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Margaret Walker Alexander National African-American Research Center, and for other purposes.
